metadata.title: Astrological Modes Data
metadata.description: Cardinal, Fixed, and Mutable mode energies and spiritual guidance

cardinal.name: Cardinal
cardinal.description: Cardinal sparks new cycles. It initiates change, rallies intention into action, and leads with visionary drive.
cardinal.prompt: Identify one area begging for fresh momentum‚Äîtake that first bold step now.
cardinal.vybePrompt: Today marks your starting line‚Äîtake that inaugural leap and watch the universe rise to meet you.

fixed.name: Fixed
fixed.description: Fixed anchors energy. It solidifies growth, sustains focus, and embodies the power of steadfast devotion.
fixed.prompt: Choose one commitment to honour today‚Äîshow up with unwavering presence.
fixed.vybePrompt: Root yourself in your purpose‚Äîsteady persistence now yields the abundant rewards you seek.

mutable.name: Mutable
mutable.description: Mutable flows with change. It adapts, pivots, and gracefully transitions from ending to beginning.
mutable.prompt: Notice one area of life that's shifting‚Äîwelcome the impermanence and flow with its tide.
